mapper.select: select e.EMeterID from EMeters e,Ertus s where e.ErtuID=s.ErtuID and s.ErtuLocation="同安" and e.`Online`=1 and s.`Online`=1 and e.ErtuID!=6

SELECT p.*,e.EMeterName FROM PowerAnalyze p,EMeters e,Estations s where e.EMeterName = #{EMeterName} and e.EStationID=s.EStationID and s.EStationName=#{EStationName} and e.EMeterID=p.EMeterID
and p.TimeTag = #{beginTime}
and p.TimeTag BETWEEN #{beginTime} and DATE_ADD(#{beginTime}, INTERVAL 30 DAY)
order by TimeTag
